item.title: Bella add a quote by Shiro Amano
item.description: "This world has been connected...tied to the darkness...soon to be completely eclipsed...there is very much to learn...you understand so little...a meaningless effort...one who knows nothing cannot understand nothing." -- Shiro Amano

item.title: Bella add a quote by Nikki Sixx
item.description: "When You've lost it all....thats when you realize that Life is Beautiful." -- Nikki Sixx

item.title: Bella add a quote by Tommy Lee
item.description: "So there we were shooting Jack Daniels into our veins, like what the fuck we can just drink it." -- Tommy Lee

item.title: Bella add a quote by Three Days Grace
item.description: "No one knows I lost my soul long ago" -- Three Days Grace

item.title: Bella add a quote by Tom Waits
item.description: "and the earth died screaming, while I lay dreaming..." -- Tom Waits

item.title: Bella add a quote by Tanya Huff
item.description: "Isn't that just like a man. 450-fucking-years-old and he's still thinking with his balls!" -- Tanya Huff

item.title: Bella add a quote by P.C. Cast
item.description: "Remember, darkness does not always equate to evil, just as light does not always bring good." -- P.C. Cast

item.title: Bella add a quote by Tommy Lee
item.description: "Just because we are wearing lipstick doesn't mean we can't kick your ass!" -- Tommy Lee

item.title: Bella add a quote by Grateful Dead
item.description: "Sometimes you get shown the light in the strangest of places if you look at it right" -- Grateful Dead

item.title: Bella add a quote by Marilyn Manson
item.description: "Music is the strongest form of magic." -- Marilyn Manson

item.title: Bella add a quote by Marilyn Manson
item.description: "I never said to be like me, I say be yourself and make a difference." -- Marilyn Manson

item.title: Bella add a quote by Marilyn Manson
item.description: "Times have not become more violent. They have just become more televised." -- Marilyn Manson

item.title: Bella add a quote by Marilyn Manson
item.description: "I walked away exhilarated by my success, because there's nothing like making a difference in someone's life, even if that difference is a lifetime of nightmares and a fortune in therapy bills." -- Marilyn Manson

item.title: Bella add a quote by Nikki Sixx
item.description: "What's worse? Being strung out or being fat?" -- Nikki Sixx

item.title: Bella add a quote by Nikki Sixx
item.description: "There is something about spending Christmas alone, naked, sitting by the Christmas tree gripping a shotgun, that lets you know your life is spinning dangerously outta control." -- Nikki Sixx

item.title: Bella add a quote by Nikki Sixx
item.description: "When you die, every single muscle in your body hurts. Your body has closed down because it thinks it's done, and when it gets rebooted, every inch of you hurts. Plus I'd had the shit beaten out of me with a baseball bat." -- Nikki Sixx

item.title: Bella add a quote by Nikki Sixx
item.description:
"<b>A Short Alternative Medical Dictionary</b> <i>Definitions courtesy of Dr Lemuel Pillmeister (also known as Lemmy)</i>
<u>Addiction</u> - When you can give up something any time, as long as it's next Tuesday. <u>Cocaine</u> - Peruvian Marching Powder. A stimulant that has the extraordinary effect that the more you do, the more you laugh out of context. <u>Depression</u> - When everything you laugh at is miserable and you can't seem to stop. <u>Heroin</U> - A drug that helps you to escape reality, while making it much harder to cope when you are recaptured. <u>Psychosis</u> - When everybody turns into tiny dolls and they have needles in their mouths and they hate you and you don't care because you have THE KNIFE! AHAHAHAHAHAHA!" -- Nikki Sixx

item.title: Bella add a quote by Nikki Sixx
item.description: "when you can’t climb your way out of such a hole, you tend to crouch down and call it home…" -- Nikki Sixx

item.title: Bella add a quote by Nikki Sixx
item.description: "You know, it's pretty easy reading this book to see why I was angry and confused for all those years. I lived my life being told different stories: some true, some lies and I still don't know which is which. Children are born innocent. At birth we are very much like a new hard drive - no viruses, no bad information, no crap that's been downloaded into it yet. It's what we feed into that hard drive, or in my case "head drive" that starts the corruption of the files." -- Nikki Sixx

item.title: Bella add a quote by Edgar Allen Poe
item.description: "Words have no power to impress the mind without the exquisite horror of their reality." -- Edgar Allen Poe
